name: Happy Little Bugs
description:
Noooo! Many Bugs been caught and put in the bottles!

A bee can only survive 20 seconds without air even butterflies can survive a bit longer they are all going to die .....
BUT WAIT!! What's that? Is that a bird? Is that superman? NO.... It is 'Bug'! Our almighty 'Hero' is here, he is the only one who can break the bottles free his bug-mates from suffocation.

   KUNG FU BUG FEATURES:  

- TWO different control  
- 45 challenging levels (a lot more to come) 
- Funny voice overs 
- Nice graphics
